name: d3plus-text
description: Smart SVG text box with line wrapping and automatic font scaling.

scripts.dev: npm run serve & nodemon --watch src/ -x "npm run pretest"
scripts.prepublish: npm run docs && uglifyjs build/d3plus-text.js -c -m -o build/d3plus-text.min.js && rm -f build/d3plus-text.zip && zip -j build/d3plus-text.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3plus-text.js build/d3plus-text.min.js
scripts.test: npm run serve & eslint src/* test/browser/*.js && casperjs test ./test/browser/*.js && killall node
